query: SELECT f.code, f.name, COUNT(c.id) as control_count FROM frameworks f LEFT JOIN controls c ON f.id = c.frameworkId GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY f.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2m1ctgqj5uashnj.root --database AS2yc6bjPtUHJmZyFBFARQ --execute SELECT f.code, f.name, COUNT(c.id) as control_count FROM frameworks f LEFT JOIN controls c ON f.id = c.frameworkId GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY f.id;

rows.name: National Cybersecurity Authority Essential Cybersecurity Controls
Communications and Information Technology Commission Regulations
